author: Ubisoft
description: Join us alongside RobinSwords, as we discuss historical accuracy in this episode of the Combat Series! ⚔️
title: Lights and Heavies are For Honor's bread and butter.

author: Ubisoft
description:
Join the Motorfest archivist on a thrilling ride across Europe to uncover the continent’s most stunning automotive legends in new events every week! Including Bugatti, Porsche and the brand new Triumph brand!

Try the new Luxury Chronicles Europe Playlist starting August 6th in #TheCrewMotorfest
 
The Crew Motorfest is available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Ubisoft Connect PC, Epic Games Store, Luna and is included in the Ubisoft+ subscription. Get the game now on: https://ubi.li/1DX4P
 
Transfer hundreds of cars from The Crew 2 to The Crew Motorfest for FREE with the Collection Import. More info here: https://ubi.li/rHcEZ

About The Crew Motorfest:
Welcome to Motorfest, the ultimate open-world driving experience. Explore the beautiful Hawaiiaan archipelago, from O'ahu to the newly-added Maui island, at the wheel of the most prestigious vehicles. Discover the best of car culture through intense races, themed events, unexpected challenges, and collect hun
title: The Crew Motorfest: Luxury Chronicles Europe Playlist Trailer
